name: Patina
description:
You play as Rusty, a goblin engineer, tasked with finding the scavengers who plundered his robotic bff, Bebot.

Movement: WADS, Arrows
Jump: Space, Up Arrow
Dash: LShift
Attack: X
Menu: ESC

Made for Boss Rush Jam 2023

Art, animation - Devan Brown
Code, music, art - Tyler Hahn
Music, art - Kelsey Hahn
Code - Hunter Ruth
